product.name: Foundation
product.brief_description: Maybelline Superstay Active Wear Full Coverage 30 Hour Long-lasting Liquid Foundation 03 True Ivory Packaging May Vary
product.p1: Full coverage, lightweight foundation with 30-hour wear, Water, sweat and transfer resistant
product.p2: Natural satiny, matte finish, Evens out and camouflages skin imperfections for a flawless complexion
product.p3: Apply smoothly and evenly to face with fingertips or clean foundation brush, Pair with a makeup primer for even longer wear
product.p4: Oil-free, non-comedogenic formula will not clog pores, Dermatologist tested, Suitable for all skin types
product.p5: Contents: 1x Maybelline New York Superstay Activewear 30 Hour Long-lasting Liquid Foundation in True Ivory, 30 ml
product.p8: Item dimensions L x W x H 30 x 30 x 116 millimetres
